EmailTemplate.subject: Confirmation: Pivotal Executive Discussion Series: Enterprise Agile Transformation on 1/14
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
Thank you for registering to attend the Pivotal Executive Discussion Series: Enterprise Agile Transformation on Wednesday, January 14! Please review the details below and contact us <mailto:kruquet@pivotal.io> with any questions.
Wednesday, January 14, 2015 4:00 PM - 6:30 PM
LOCATION Pivotal 625 Ave. of Americas 2nd Floor New York, NY 10011 Map and Directions
{{my.Save the Date:default=edit me}}
We look forward to you joining us,
The Pivotal Team
